nodes.text: The Serathrace sector was located in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. By 0 ABY, it bordered the Belasco sector Coreward, the Tolemses sector Rimward, and the Axion sector spinward. The sector also formed a four-way border with the Askarian sector, the Hangshan sector, and the Harron Marches at its trailing edge. The Serathrace sector contained the Batravia system, which was the origin point of Batravian gumpluckers.

The Serathrace sector was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article "Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region."
